_description: ‘On god ureisun of ure lefdi’ — 171 lines

BLCottNeroAXIV.First Lines:
Cristes milde moder seynte marieMines liues leome mi leoue
                    lefdi…
BLCottNeroAXIV.Last Lines:
…Þet funde ðesnesong biðe mi looue
                    leafdiCristes milde moder seinte marie. Amen.
